concept.title: Checking Locking Status and IPC State Information

conbody.p: Run the showlocks command to display a list of all ACTIVE and PENDING locks plus additional IPC-related state information associated with the indicated data store.
Use the --delete-ipc-data switch only if it is determined that a process has crashed and left the IPC-state information in a corrupted state. This switch is meant for use as a last-resort solution.
